author: Ubisoft
description: Become a champion of the Wu Lin with the Hero Skin of Prince Yi, a full body customization of the Tiandi.
title: Become a champion of the Wu Lin with the Hero Skin of Prince Yi!

author: Ubisoft
description:
Become a champion of the Wu Lin with the Hero Skin of Prince Yi, a full body customization of the Tiandi.

About For Honor:
Carve a path of destruction through the battlefield fighting for guts, glory, and survival in For Honor. Enter the chaos of a raging war as a Hero from some of the greatest warrior legacies ever known. For Honor is a fast-paced and immersive experience, mixing skill with visceral, never-before-seen melee combat.

Enjoy incredible seasonal content, engaging campaign and thrilling multiplayer with friends online, in split screen two-player co-op, or solo against AI.

#Ubisoft #ForHonor 

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

© 2025 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered trademarks in the US and/or other countries.
title: For Honor: Content Of The Week - December 4

author: Ubisoft
title: Views from: Assassin's Creed Mirage 💖 Have you explored #ValleyofMemory yet?#AssassinsCreedMirage

author: Ubisoft
description:
Discover This is Motorfest, a new series of short videos presented by the developers of The Crew Motorfest, designed to offer an overview of all the game’s key features. In this episode, learn everything you need to know about Demolition Royale, a battle royale multiplayer mode, with cars and planes involved!

The Crew Motorfest is available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Ubisoft Connect PC, Epic Games Store, Luna and is included in the Ubisoft+ subscription. Get the game now on: [https://ubi.li/1DX4P]

Transfer hundreds of cars from The Crew 2 to The Crew Motorfest for FREE with the Collection Import. More info here: [https://ubi.li/rHcEZ]

About The Crew Motorfest:
